title: ping.jsp throws unhandled exception type "Throwable"
description: The JSP ping.jsp throws an exception of type "Throwable", but nowhere indicates it throws this exception.  myEclipse Blue (and, I'd expect, just about any Eclipse JSP editor) flags this as an error.  This is a bit annoying, as the error indication flag then percolates up thru the entire project in myEclipse.

comments.author: Matthew Buckett
comments.content: You can "fix" the "error" by just rethrowing the Throwable error in a RuntimeException.

comments.author: Jan Høydahl
comments.content:
Closing old issue related to JSP which is now gone from Solr.
